data.name: Project_IISNotInstalled

data.name: Project_P_ReMapVDir_Path

data.name: Project_AspNetNotRegistered
data.value: ASP.NET {0} has not been registered on the Web server. You need to manually configure your Web server for ASP.NET {0} in order for your site to run correctly.

data.name: Project_ScriptmapFailure
data.value: Configuring Web {0} for ASP.NET {1} failed. You must manually configure this site for ASP.NET {1} in order for the site to run correctly. {2}

data.name: Project_LocalUrlRequiredToCreateSite
data.value: Cannot create the Web site '{0}'. You must specify "localhost" for the server name

data.name: Project_AdminReqToCreateSiteWithPort
data.value: Cannot create the Web site '{0}'. You must run Visual Studio in the context of an administrator account to create IIS Express sites with ports less than 1024.

data.name: Project_MissingComponents
data.value: Components required to work with web servwers are not available. Make sure the Web workload is installed.

data.name: CantGetApplcationHostConfigFile
data.value: Failed to get the path to the applicationhost.config file.

data.name: Project_Requires64BitOS
data.value: Project {0} has been configured to run the 64 bit version of IIS Express which is not available on this 32 bit operating system. If the project does not require the 64 bit version of IIS Express, change this option on the project's 'Web' property page.
